title: Day 8: $100 Savings Challenge (I cancelled an auto-renewal to save $113!)
description: It’s Day 8 of the $100 Savings Challenge and I didn’t fully follow the directions today (I’ll share more below why that’s the case!), but I did cancel an auto-renewal and that’s going to guarantee we don’t accidentally spend $100 on an auto-renewal. We’re in Atlanta for the baseball tournament through tomorrow. We are having a greatRead More
author: Crystal Paine
